features: 🎁【More abundant paper roll gifts】 The product contains five rolls coloured thermal paper and five roll of colourful self-adhesive paper. Our mini printer enables you to create colourful and beautiful patterns. Whether it's for crafting, scrapbooking or simply adding a touch of personalisation to your belongings, this printer is the ultimate educational playmate for children and a creative tool for anyone looking for inspiration.

🎁【Portable Size and Stylish Design】This compact pocket printer features a small and lightweight body with a stylish design for those who want to make a statement. You can easily carry it in your pocket or bag and take it with you wherever you go. Whether you're using it at home, in the office or on the go, this printer is sure to turn heads

🎁【Multifunctional Pocket Printer & Ideal Gift】Inkless pocket printer is used to print black and white pictures/photos,memo,shopping lists,study/meeting notes,business, work plan, office assistant, shopping list,labels, messages, lists, web pages, QR codes, records,etc. Suitable for office, home, students,children, amateur archivists, treasure moms and other application themes. Also a best gifts for kids on festivals/Christmas/New Year/Birthday.

🎁【Powerful Mobile App】The “Tiny Print” app is available to users free of charge for an unlimited period of time. With just one click, you can print and save time and effort. The app offers a wide range of templates to choose from, including tags, lists, messages, as well as different material themes such as Christmas, Easter, Thanksgiving and everyday line drawings. Choose from a variety of media types to print interesting and vibrant images.

🎁【Package Included】1 mini printer,10 rolls (5 roll of colourful self-adhesive printable stickers，5 roll of thermal paper), 1 USB charging cable, 1 instruction manual and 24-hour after-sales service. If you have any questions about our wireless portable printers, contact us via email and we will do our best to provide the best solution for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Preschool education and parent-child time This compact printer offers a range of features that make it an ideal tool for engaging in fun and creative activities with your children. With its Bluetooth connectivity, the Mini Pocket Printer allows you to easily print photos, drawings, and other creative designs directly from your smartphone. Whether you're capturing special moments or creating personalized artwork, this printer brings convenience and functionality to your fingertips.
4 Thermal Paper and 1 white Sticker Paper

Enjoy Colourful Time One of the standout features of this printer is its ability to enjoy the color game. It comes equipped with four rolls of paper in different vibrant colors, allowing your children to unleash their creativity and explore a world of imagination. Additionally, the package includes a roll of adhesive stickers, enabling them to further enhance their creations and add a touch of personalization.

Attention: Common problems and solutions Q: Is the printed paper blank and patternless? A: The direction and position of the paper are reversed, and a different angle is needed. It can be placed according to the video and images Q:Is the printer unable to charge? A: Try changing to another adapter

Child's Perfect Gift Child's Perfect Gift: Not only is the Mini Pocket Printer a fantastic tool for family bonding and creative expression, but it also makes for a wonderful gift. It combines the elements of creativity, fun, and practicality, making it an ideal choice for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion. Children will be thrilled to receive a device that allows them to print their artwork, photos, and personalized designs, fostering their imagination and artistic skills. It's a gift that keeps on giving, providing endless opportunities for creative exploration and joyful moments. Whether it's Christmas, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Easter, Birthday, Halloween, Thanksgiving, or any special occasion, this printer serves as a perfect present for children and parents alike.

The Mini Pocket Printer is not only portable and travel-friendly but also ink-free and safe for kids to use. With its compact size, it can be easily carried anywhere, allowing for creative activities on the go. This printer serves as an excellent gift for children, combining creativity and practicality in a fun and engaging manner. It encourages their artistic development and provides a platform for self-expression, making it a memorable and cherished present for any child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Gift for Students!!
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my daughter to help with her High School studies. Small, lightweight, prints decent quality. Easy to use and great for notes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter went crazy for this printer Christmas morning. She started printing and journaling immediately. I ordered more paper rolls for her that morning. She is still creating with it every day. What a great gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Be advised on age requirement for the app it uses
reviews.reviewText: In order to use their app that this printer requires, you must be 17. Be advised. I’d bought it for an 11year old and ran into a huge hiccup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Adventures in Printing
reviews.reviewText: I'm still exploring the world of portable printing, and the Notebuddy Mini Pocket Bluetooth Printer has piqued my interest. The Android app is straightforward and user-friendly. From my experience so far, the print quality is impressively accurate, adding to my excitement in uncovering all its potential uses!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grand daughter and I have enjoyed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dont waste your money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. You definitely get what you pay for but I honestly thought this would serve the purpose of making inexpensive stickers for treat bags . It he skipping sound is the paper sticking or not advancing. If i put a little pressure on it SOMETIMES it works correctly. Not all the time. I got one roll done before it started the skipping crap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy connection, easy job
reviews.reviewText: Better than any similar product before

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broke after one use
reviews.reviewText: Got 2 for my kids. My youngest printed a photo. It came out nice but it wouldn't print after that.
